nodes.text: The largest moon of the planet Phaegon III contained rich deposits of Lignan ore beneath its outer crust, where it was home to several species of animals. Shortly before the Battle of Kirrek in 5000 BBY, Sith Lords Saes Rrogon and Yaru Korsin harvested the Lignan from the moon for use in the upcoming Sith invasion, exterminating all life on the moon, along with much of the crust. They were ambushed, however, by Relin Druur and Drev Hassin.
